channel.title: ProgressBar on Peanuts Code
channel.description: Recent content in ProgressBar on Peanuts Code

item.title: Circular Progress Bar in Godot3
item.description: In this article, I will show you how to create a circular progress bar. By using a circular progress bar instead of the usual portrait or landscape orientation, you can add a little accent to your screen, so please refer to this tutorial if you find a use for it. At the end of the tutorial, we will also show you some sample progress bars that are not circular (e.g., heart-shaped), so if you are interested, please take a look at them as well. The final project file for this tutorial is available at GitHub repository . If you download
